botch.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to do something badly, because you have been careless or because you do not have the skill to do it properly
botch.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The builders really botched up our patio.
botch.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a piece of work, a job etc that has been badly or carelessly done
botch.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Iâ€™ve just made an awful botch of my translation.
The whole thing was a botch job.
